content: Hello, i wonder if it is possible to "ship" arbitrary files within crates? The expectation is downstream crates can request to use them somehow in build.rs. Or ignore silently if the data is never used. Something that is user-defined metadata.
@Charles Lew not sure what you mean, but maybe something like https://crates.io/crates/rust-embed?
Thanks, this is helpful. (Intended to create this topic in the general channel but got it wrong)
